columns.name: resource_share_name
columns.description: The name of the resource share.

columns.name: resource_share_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resoure Name (ARN) of the resource share.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the association.

columns.name: associated_entity
columns.description: The ID of an Amazon Web Services account/The Amazon Resoure Name (ARN) of an organization in Organizations/The ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations/The ARN of an IAM role The ARN of an IAM user.

columns.name: association_type
columns.description: The type of entity included in this association.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The date and time when the association was created.

columns.name: external
columns.description: Indicates whether the principal belongs to the same organization in Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource share.

columns.name: last_updated_time
columns.description: The date and time when the association was last updated..

columns.name: status_message
columns.description: A message about the status of the association.

columns.name: resource_share_permission
columns.description: Information about an RAM permission that is associated with a resource share and any of its resources of a specified type.
